original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 24.9. Hetuduka, Piṭṭhiduka
analyzed: hetuduka piṭṭhiduka

original: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paccayā hetu dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nanahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na na hetum na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: na hetum na na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe sahajāte

original: pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nanahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: na hetum na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe sahajāte

original: pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nahetuṁ nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca hetu sa vitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Sabbattha saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi sabbattha saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na saraṇam dhammam paccayā hetu saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ
analyzed: na hetum na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetu

original: naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naaraṇañca
analyzed: na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na araṇam ca

original: nanahetuṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na na hetum na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
